titles.title: A resolution providing for upgrading of three positions on the Capitol Police for duty under the House of Representatives.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Referred to Subcommittee on Personnel and Police.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 9/22/1988--Introduced. Establishes one additional position of captain, one additional position of lieutenant, and one additional position of sergeant on the Capitol Police, each for duty under the House of Representatives. Abolishes three positions of private on the Capitol Police for duty under the House of Representatives.
